channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 1 meter wide pothole in pavement with raised tarmac due to roots, 3rd April
item.description:
Pavement leading to the driveways of 54 & 56 Kipling Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 56, Kipling Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deteriorated crossover to 34 and 36 Albert Road (already reported, but only very partial fix completed), 3rd April
item.description:
Between the gates to 34 and 36 Albert Road and the road. The crossover needs filling with stones and then tarmac to bring it up to the level of the road. When it rains - or has rained in the last few days - it's just a large muddy puddle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Albert Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Drain cover is standing upright, 3rd April
item.description:
Drain cover is upright in the drain, would cause serious damage if someone hits it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Along both verges of the A40 Golden Valley bypass are masses of litter and rubbish., 3rd April
item.description:
A40 ‘golden valley' from Gloucester Rd Cheltenham roundabout to Elmbridge Court Gloucs. roundabout there’s masses of litter and rubbish on both verges which is a threat to pecking birds, small animals and if it stays dry a fire risk. Can this road’s verges be cleaned please. BTW I’m happy to volunteer to litter pick if others are and it's organised by Highways. IT'S NO LONGER A GOLDEN VALLEY BUT A TRASH VALLEY.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pothole, on side of speed bump, 3rd April
item.description:
Pothole is on the site of the speed bump, just before the turn into Oldbury Orchard, when turning left out of Albermarle Road, Churchdown
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brookfield Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 3rd April
item.description:
We are furious to turn up at our property 32 upper park street Cheltenham to find an ugly post with sign placed directly in front of our house, not only is it ugly it is unnecessary, also whoever installed these posts clearly have no consideration for what this looks like for our properties or common sense as to where to position them! There is a sign on the lamppost 4 houses up it is really overkill in our opinion. How about sticking them all along the fronts of the houses on the other side of the road and see what reception you would get from those neighbours.! There is also a lamppost across the road that you could have used! I am emailing you to advise that we are considering reinstating the front door as you can see the outline in the paint where it was before so you will need to remove this post and if not we will have to remove it ourselves!
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)
